it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server

Class ServerRMIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server.ServerRMIManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerRemoteRMI, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote 

    public class ServerRMIManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ServerRemoteRMI
    Server rmi manager is the class exposing the remote methods of ServerRemoteRMI. It also keeps track of the instantiated ClientHandlerRMI objects, that is of the connected clients.

    When an incoming object is received through the dedicated method, this is dispatched to the correspondent instance of ClientHandlerRMI.
